channel.title: Help
channel.description:
Ok...First of all USING YOUS-WORLD508/525 SOURCE CODEUSA BASE...
Pic Problems... [IMG]http://i887.photobucket.com/albums/ac77/Caldito/Problems.png[/img]
1.-How do I change the exp rate for summoning and other combat skills? 2.-can some one put me a link for a 508/525 Summoning Tutorial? 3.-How to make a "command" that requires 500 kills on PvP and gives you and special item and you can do it only one time. 4.- and need a command ::kills to check your kills. Thanks

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @owns_reece owns reece
item.description:
@owns_reece wrote:

put this into commands.java:

if (cmd[0].equals("mypkp")) { p.requestForceChat("I currently have " + p.KC + " kills, and " + p.DC + " deaths!"); }

Read full topic

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @str2own99 str2own99
item.description:
@str2own99 wrote:

if u cant code 508 move onto 317

Read full topic
